data.title: How to Change My Website's Domain Name
data.meta_description: Learn how to change a specific website's domain name within the Client Area of your SiteGround account
data.text:
To change the domain name associated with your website, go to your Client Area > Websites. From there click the kebab menu for the desired site and hit Change Primary Domain. On the page that opens input the new desired domain name and click Confirm. Make sure that the new domain name is registered and pointed to your SiteGround website. Note that you can not select a SiteGround temporary domain name at this step. It is available only upon new site creation.

The new domain name should be registered and pointed to your SiteGround website before the primary domain name change.

Note that if you are collaborating on this website with someone else, the change should be made by the website owner.
